attributes.action: give urgent consideration to giving RICHARD TODD a knighthood (or honourary).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Richard Todd is a man without equal. He served his country in the D-Day landings and subsequent campaigns and went on to star in some of the most iconic films of the post war era.
This is a man who has earnt his knighthood and deserves this nations thanks.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
